name: Cargo Van
description: Cargo Van: Perfect for studio apartments, small moves, or quick deliveries. Maneuvers easily in city traffic.

name: Sprinter Van
description: Sprinter Van: Great for 1-bedroom apartments or small office moves. More space than a cargo van, still easy to park.

name: 12ft Box Truck
description: 12ft Box Truck: Ideal for 1–2 room apartments, small homes, or medium deliveries.

name: 16ft Box Truck
description: 16ft Box Truck: Best for 2–4 room apartments or mid-size moves. The go-to choice for most relocations.

name: 26ft Box Truck
description: 26ft Box Truck: Built for large homes, office moves, or big loads. Handles major moves with ease.
